eventDetails: Join the ultimate blockchain-based hackathon where developers compete to build innovative solutions using KIN x GetCode's micropayment technology. Collaborate with like-minded innovators and present your projects to top judges in the blockchain space.

eventName: Building Decentralized Apps with KIN x GetCode
eventDetails: A hands-on workshop where developers dive into building decentralized applications (dApps) using KIN x GetCode's blockchain. Ideal for both new and experienced developers looking to explore blockchain integration in real-world projects.

An engaging talk on how KIN x GetCode is revolutionizing micropayments through blockchain. Learn about decentralized payment systems, security, and future applications for blockchain in everyday digital transactions.
An evening of networking with top blockchain professionals, investors, and developers. Share ideas, discover new opportunities, and explore partnerships within the KIN x GetCode ecosystem.

Join an expert panel discussion featuring blockchain leaders discussing the future of micropayments, the challenges ahead, and how KIN x GetCode is leading the charge in transforming the digital economy.

A full-day conference featuring keynote speakers, panel discussions, and breakout sessions focused on blockchain development, payment solutions, and the latest advancements in KIN x GetCode technology.
